title: 求看懂mc错误(崩溃)报告的戳进来QAQ玩不了mc了 急急急死了
txt_content:
首先ps下：
    我已经装了正确版本的java;
    mc的客户端确定没问题;
    在之前的一段时间里mc没有任何问题.
而最近打开mc登录器,会出来个黑框----但是几秒后就消失了OAO
以下是游戏消失时crash-reports文件夹生成的错误报告:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Daisy, daisy...

Time: 14-1-1 下午11:07
Description: Initializing game

java.lang.NullPointerException: Initializing game
        at java.util.Arrays$ArrayList.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.Arrays.asList(Unknown Source)
        at bqt.h(SourceFile:81)
        at bqt.a(SourceFile:90)
        at bqt.<init>(SourceFile:60)
        at azd.Z(SourceFile:386)
        at azd.e(SourceFile:689)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:103)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- Head --
Stacktrace:
        at java.util.Arrays$ArrayList.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.Arrays.asList(Unknown Source)
        at bqt.h(SourceFile:81)
        at bqt.a(SourceFile:90)
        at bqt.<init>(SourceFile:60)
        at azd.Z(SourceFile:386)

-- Initialization --
Details:
Stacktrace:
        at azd.e(SourceFile:689)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:103)

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.7.2
        Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
        Java Version: 1.7.0_45, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 3116840 bytes (2 MB) / 26808320 bytes (25 MB) up to 1037959168 bytes (989 MB)
        JVM Flags: 1 total; -Xmx1024m
        AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        Launched Version: 1.7.2
        LWJGL: 2.9.0
        OpenGL: GeForce GTS 250/PCIe/SSE2/3DNOW! GL version 3.3.0, NVIDIA Corporation
        Is Modded: Probably not. Jar signature remains and client brand is untouched.
        Type: Client (map_client.txt)
        Resource Packs: []
        Current Language: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
        Vec3 Pool Size: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null
        Anisotropic Filtering: Off (1)复制代码之后我尝试这样打开游戏
